Comments_List: I learned a whole new language that I feel comfortable speaking in 8 weeks!!!
I learned the Portuguese language very rapidly.

If you are trying to learn portuguese while having the best time of your life, you have to take this course. Even if you do not pursue portuguese after the summer, the experience alone is enough to make it worth it. Bete is the most brilliant teacher in the world and the classes are always very engaging.
It's brilliantly well organized as is.
The course is very well designed for learning and retaining! I wouldn't change anything.
This course really encourages you to maintain consistent practice and interaction with the Portuguese language. Because of this, picking up the basics was made much easier!

This course is very engaging and dumps you right into the world of portuguese from the very beginning. The only thing I would say is that some students struggle more then others and sometimes there is a very clear advantage to other students.
100% Bete is a remarkable teacher and you will learn Portuguese.
I would! This course is a special opportunity to quickly pick up a beautiful new language. Brazilian Portuguese is wonderful.
I would! not only is it taught very well, but it's also a great opportunity to get to know Brazil.
